text.textblock: LEGAL SERVICES CORPORATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS

date.textblock: The Legal Services Corporation Board of Directors Audit and Appropriations Committee will meet on January 27, 1994. The meeting will commence at 10:00 a.m.
The Legal Services Corporation, 750 First Street, NE., 11th Floor, The Board Room, Washington, D.C. 20002, (202) 336-8800.
2. Approval of Minutes of January 6-7, 1994 Meeting
3. Presentation of Report By Grant/Thornton Regarding the Corporation's Fiscal Year 1993 Financial Audit
4. Consider and Act on Proposed Fiscal Year 1994 Consolidated Operating Budget for the Corporation
5. Consider and Act on Staff Recommendations on Fiscal Year 1995 Consolidated Operating Budget for the Corporation
Upon request, meeting notices will be made available in alternate formats to accommodate visual and hearing impairments.
Individuals who have a disability and need an accommodation to attend the meeting may notify Patricia Batie at (202) 336-8800.
